post.content:
Senator Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) became heads on the inauguration of United States President Joe Biden. Unfortunately, it wasn’t because he rushed in love Stone Frigid Steve Austin and stealing the presidency with a folding chair, nonetheless merely for sitting quietly in a at ease outfit and practicing social distancing. The 2nd took over the online for a whereas, and now the democratic socialist is in Soulcalibur VI. Humorous how that works.

The mod, created by Particular person619 with a Joe Mashups model commissioned by ToastedShoes, imagines a world wherein Bernie has been taken from the sizzling day and plopped impartial into the 16th century war of Soulcalibur VI. True survey at him scamper.

Determined, Bernie’s gathered carrying his ideally suited coat and mittens, nonetheless he can also summon a diversity of magical weapons out of thin air à la Azwel, the Soulcalibur persona whose combating vogue he mimics in Particular person619’s demo. And whereas he doesn’t in actuality scamper a lot, it’s hilarious staring on the flesh presser scamper toe-to-toe with fantastical warring parties love Siegfried, Grøh, and Seong Mi-na whereas sitting in a chair.

The senator’s Soulcalibur cameo is only one in every of many over this previous week. In want to let his 2nd as a meme scamper by, Bernie (or, more seemingly, any individual working for his advertising and marketing campaGaming Origin) swiftly had shirts and sweatshirts printed featuring his without warning iconic picture from the U.S. Capitol. When the “Chairman Sanders” dresses line equipped out, they became round and gave the proceeds to Meals on Wheels in his home command of Vermont, a donation amounting to $1.8 million in accordance to The Linked Press.

That’s all to negate that, whereas this Soulcalibur VI mod is fun, I’m hoping Bernie isn’t going to be doing any time traveling any time quickly. We can gathered use him right here.
